statements: UPDATE hypothesis_tests SET sample_size = 1000, dataset_name = 'Experiment A' WHERE test_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE hypothesis_tests SET significance_level = 0.05, hypothesis_description = 'New hypothesis' WHERE dataset_name = 'Control group';

UPDATE hypothesis_tests SET result = 'significant' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE datasets SET data_source = 'New source', dataset_description = 'Updated description' WHERE dataset_id = 10;

UPDATE datasets SET data_source='New Data Source', data_type='Updated Type' WHERE dataset_id=5
UPDATE hypothesis_testing SET test_result = 'significant' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dataset_information SET data_description = 'Updated data description' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE hypothesis_testing SET test_result='significant', decision='reject' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE dataset_information SET data_description='This dataset contains sales data for the year 2021.', data_type='sales' WHERE dataset_name='Sales2021';
UPDATE hypothesis_tests SET hypothesis_statement = 'Updated hypothesis statement' WHERE test_id = 1;
